text: I am in the learning process. I am trying to create a page from a template I made but there is no option for "Website Pages" when I click "Marketing" > "Website" like it tells me in the tutorial. Any tips?
"Website Pages" is only available  if you bought the CMS Addon iirc
What Andreas said, but the CMS is also available via some levels of the marketing plan
Where do I go to find that?
Just want to make sure this is the right one to get access to Website Pages

Question: I have a blog and I'm trying to set it up so works like a timeline. The posts would be filtered by Month. The timeline is a fixed/sticky element on the left that highlights the month as it goes to each grouping. I'm close to completing it, but I'm wondering if there is a better way to add in the fixed timeline... Any thoughts? I only need the month to appear once. (not listed with every post) When you use the default post filter module, you can list them by month but it's essentially just a link... I need it to actually show the posts next to the month in a grouping.
I think you’d have to use JS for that one

Maybe a for loop through the posts where you set an external variable to the month’s number and compare it to the next posts number. Then if it’s different you take the top offset of that element, draw a dot there on the left and translate the month number to a month name using .parseDate() or whatever
You’ll have to redraw the whole thing whenever the posts stack as the window gets more narrow, maybe on any resize event because the posts could get taller if the titles break
You’re welcome! Sorry I can’t get deeper into it right now.
